tasks.description: Talk to Yoel of Londor not far from the Foot of the High Wall bonfire
Received after trading a Homeward Bone with Pickle Pee, Pump-a-Rum Crow
Talk to the Cornyx of the Great Swamp in the Undead Settlement, and accept his services. Talk to him again at Firelink Shrine to get the gesture
Received by talking to Leonhard after defeating the Darkwraith in High Wall of Lothric at his request
Finish Anri of Astora's questline up to Irithyll of the Boreal Valley. They will grant you the gesture when speaking to them at the Church of Yorshka Bonfire
Received during the Siegward of Catarina questline
Talk to Blacksmith Andre
Received from praying at the Altar of Sunlight in Lothric Castle, near the Dragonslayer Armour boss fight
Obtained from Knight Slayer Tsorig deep in the Demon Ruins, regardless of who wins the fight

Kill Yellowfinger Heysel, the NPC invader in Farron Keep. Then give a pale tongue to the Rosaria's Fingers covenant. Yellowfinger Heysel's summon sign appears next to the tower full of slugs near the Keep Ruins bonfire. Summon her to receive the gesture. Abyss Watchers must be alive
Received from meeting Yuria of Londor
Received after summoning Londor Pale Shade before Abyss Watchers or Pontiff Sulyvahn
Pray to the Old Wolf of Farron in the Farron Swamp
Received from speaking with Sirris of the Sunless Realms in Firelink Shrine after she arrives
Received from summoning Black Hand Gotthard. He will perform the gesture as he is summoned
Received from Irina of Carim
Given by Orbeck of Vinheim once you buy Aural Decoy, Farron Flashsword, Pestilent Mist, and Spook
Received after resting at a bonfire for the first time
Received from meeting Hawkwood
Talk to Patches while he's sitting in Firelink Shrine
Received from Patches after replying no when he asks for forgiveness, or after confronting him in the Cathedral of the Deep after he lowers the bridge with "You know who I am"
Received by talking to Siegward of Catarina after defeating the demon in Undead Settlement
After receiving the Toast gesture from Siegward of Catarina, wait for him to go to sleep. Then talk to him again
Talk to Greirat of the Undead Settlement after giving him Loretta's bone and resting at the bonfire
Found on the corpse of Laddersmith Gilligan on the first bonfire in Profaned Capital
Received from corpse after Oceiros, the Consumed King
Sold by Yoel of Londor/Yuria of Londor / Orbeck Of Vinheim for 1000 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 3000 souls
Sold by Yoel of Londor/Yuria of Londor / Orbeck Of Vinheim for 2000 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 4000 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 500 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 2000 souls. Requires Sage's Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 5000 souls. Requires Sage's Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 6000 souls. Requires Logan's Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 18,000 souls. Requires Crystal Scroll
Obtained by Soul of a Crystal Sage Transposition
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 5000 souls. Requires Logan's Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 15,000 souls. Requires Crystal Scroll
Obtained by Soul of Consumed Oceiros Transposition
Found in the Grand Archive behind an illusory wall near the Boreal Outrider Knight
Sold by Yoel of Londor/Yuria of Londor / Orbeck Of Vinheim for 5000 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 3000 souls
Sold by Yoel of Londor/Yuria of Londor for 4500 and Orbeck Of Vinheim for 3000 souls
From the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire, turn around 180 and head towards the shortcut gate to Road of Sacrifices. The spell will be on a corpse at the gate
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 10,000 souls. Requires Crystal Scroll
Sold by Yoel of Londor/Yuria of Londor for 4500 and Orbeck Of Vinheim for 3000 souls
Found in Irithyll Dungeon
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 2000 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 2000 souls
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 1000 souls. Requires any scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 1000 souls. Requires Golden Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 2000 souls. Requires Golden Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 1500 souls. Requires Golden Scroll
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 3000 souls. Requires Golden Scroll

Found in the Church of Yorshka bonfire in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley during Anri's questline. The spell will drop from an assassin disguised as a statue. Found in Darkmoon Tomb on the pilgrim's corpse
Sold by Orbeck Of Vinheim for 6000 souls. Requires Golden Scroll
Obtained by Soul of Deacons of the Deep Transposition
Aldrich Faithful Rank 1 reward
Sold by Karla for 15,000 souls
Sold by Karla for 8000 souls
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 1000 souls
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 3000 souls. Requires Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 5000 souls. Requires Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 10,000 souls. Requires Izalith Pyromancy Tome
Acquired from Soul of the Old Demon King Transposition
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 1000 souls
Sold by Karla for 10,000 souls. Requires Quelana Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Karla for 15,000 souls. Requires Quelana Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 12,000 souls. Requires Izalith Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 3,000 souls
Found within the lava area of Smouldering Lake where you fight Knight Slayer Tsorig
Found at the foot of the Giant in Irithyll Dungeon
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 2,000 souls. Requires Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
Found on corpse in lava area of the Catacombs of Carthus
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 6,000 souls. Requires Carthus Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 1,000 souls
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 2,000 souls. Requires Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
Found in the Farron Keep swamp
Found on a corpse behind a hidden wall in Grand Archives
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 8,000 souls. Requires Carthus Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Cornyx of the Great Swamp for 10,000 souls. Requires Carthus Pyromancy Tome
Mound Makers Rank 2 reward
Sold by Karla for 7000 souls. Requires Quelana Pyromancy Tome
Acquired from Soul of a Stray Demon Transposition
Sold by Karla for 10,000 souls. Requires Grave Warden Pyromancy Tome
Sold by Karla for 10,000 souls. Requires Grave Warden Pyromancy Tome
Acquired from Soul of High Lord Wolnir Transposition
Purchased from Shrine Handmaid for 500 souls
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 1000 souls
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 3500 souls. Requires Braille Divine Tome of Carim
Found on corpse in the Irithyll of the Boreal Valley
Acquired by Soul of the Dancer Transposition
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 1000 souls
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 5000 souls. Requires Braille Divine Tome of Lothric
Acquired by Soul of Rosaria Transposition
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 1500 souls
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 10,000 souls. Requires Braille Divine Tome of Carim
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 3000 souls
Looted from a corpse in Cathedral of the Deep. Just past the first giant and down the stairs to the left. It's a sort of dark ish room above the Cathedral Knight with the mace
Warriors of Sunlight Rank 1 reward
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 1000 souls. Requires Braille Divine Tome of Carim
Acquired by Siegward of Catarina during third encounter. Below Irithyll of the Boreal Valley in a kitchen just after a sewer area
Acquired by dropping from the ledge near the spellcaster on the roof in Profaned Capital

Use the elevator near the Old Wolf of Farron and take the stairs up. Turn to the right and run to the closed gate. On the right side of the gate drop down and follow the path, one of the items there is Lightning Spear
Warriors of Sunlight Rank 2 reward
Acquired by Soul of the Lords Transposition
Dropped by the Carthus Sandworm before the Old Demon King boss fight
Acquired by Soul of the Nameless King Transposition
Found at the top of Lothric Castle
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 8,000 souls. Requires Braille Divine Tome of Lothric
Located in Irithyll Dungeon
Blade of the Darkmoon covenant Rank 2 reward
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 5000 souls. Requires Braille Divine Tome of Lothric
Archdragon Peak found off a ledge where you find Havel and a dead dragon
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 10,000 souls. Requires Londor Braille Divine Tome
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 15,000 souls. Requires Londor Braille Divine Tome
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 5000 souls. Requires Londor Braille Divine Tome
Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire. Turn around 180 degrees and follow the path until you reach a hole in the wall on your right. Drop down on the ledge below. The spell will be on a corpse
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 4000 souls. Requires Deep Braille Divine Tome
Purchased from Irina of Carim for 2000 souls. Requires Deep Braille Divine Tome
Guaranteed kill reward for the screaming Evangelist in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley, found behind an illusionary fence
Acquired from Soul of Aldrich Transposition
Available from start, requires Refined Gem
Available from start, requires Raw Gem
Available from start, requires Fire Gem
Available after acquiring Farron Coal from Road of Sacrifices, requires Heavy Gem
Available after acquiring Farron Coal from Road of Sacrifices, requires Sharp Gem
Available after acquiring Farron Coal from Road of Sacrifices, requires Poison Gem
Available after acquiring Sage's Coal from Farron Keep, requires Crystal Gem
Available after acquiring Sage's Coal from Farron Keep, requires Blessed Gem
Available after acquiring Sage's Coal from Farron Keep, requires Deep Gem
Available after acquiring Profaned Coal from Irithyll Dungeon, requires Dark Gem
Available after acquiring Profaned Coal from Irithyll Dungeon, requires Blood Gem
Available after acquiring Profaned Coal from Irithyll Dungeon, requires Hollow Gem
Available after acquiring Giant's Coal from Anor Londo, requires Lightning Gem
Available after acquiring Giant's Coal from Anor Londo, requires Simple Gem
Available after acquiring Giant's Coal from Anor Londo, requires Chaos Gem
Reach "To Link the First Flame" ending
Reach "The End of Fire" ending
Reach "The Usurpation of Fire" ending
Defeat "Heir of Fire" Iudex Gundyr
Defeat Vordt of the Boreal Valley
Defeat the Curse-rotted Greatwood
Defeat Crystal Sage
Defeat the Abyss Watchers, Lords of Cinder
Defeat the Deacons of the Deep
Defeat High Lord Wolnir
Defeat Old Demon King
Defeat Pontiff Sulyvahn
Defeat Yhorm the Giant, Lord of Cinder
Defeat Aldrich, Devourer of Gods, Lord of Cinder
Defeat Dancer of the Boreal Valley
Defeat Dragonslayer Armour
Defeat Oceiros, the Consumed King
Defeat Champion Gundyr
Defeat Lothric, Younger Prince, Lord of Cinder
Defeat Ancient Wyvern
Defeat Nameless King
Reinforce any weapon to the highest level
Reinforce a bonfire to the highest level
Reinforce the Estus Flask to the highest level
Reach the Untended Graves
Reach Archdragon Peak
Light a bonfire flame for the first time
Become a Host of Embers for the first time
Discover Warrior of Sunlight covenant
Discover Way of Blue covenant
Discover Blue Sentinels covenant
Discover Blade of the Darkmoon covenant
Discover Rosaria's Fingers covenant
Discover Mound-makers covenant
Discover Watchdogs of Farron covenant
Discover Aldrich Faithful covenant
Discover Spears of the Church covenant (The Ringed City DLC)
Starting gift or sold by the Shrine Handmaid in Firelink Shrine for 1500 souls
Found in Gwynevere's Chamber above the Aldrich, Devourer of Gods bonfire

Behind the locked door on the left side of Firelink Shrine accessible by going through the locked door on the right side of the area (which requires the 20k souls key from the Shrine Handmaid to unlock) and dropping down via coffins sticking out of the wall
Proceed from the Untended Graves bonfire and take left path. The ring is on a corpse behind some crow enemies
Under breakable crates/barrels in the bottom of the tower that you go through to exit the Siegward/Fire Demon area in Undead Settlement
Trade with Ludleth of Courland for the Soul of a Stray Demon
Defeat the guard dogs near Archdeacon McDonnell
Trade with Ludleth of Courland for the Soul of Champion Gundyr
In the Ancient Wyvern area, take the right path to the end and go around a railing
Dropped by one of the knights outside Oceiros' boss door
On a corpse hanging from a tree in the Undead Settlement by the Mound Makers cage guy. It may drop all the way down to in front of the building with the lift that leads to the giant
Proceed from the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum bonfire until you reach an outside area with some scaffolding. Climb a ladder in this area to reach the platform where the ring is located
In the lower area to the left of the open area with giants just past the Pontiff Sulyvahn bonfire
Behind a breakable wall in the Smoldering Lake area of the Catacombs of Carthus (must be broken by ballista fire)
Obtained by killing the large rat in the area across the bridge from the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire in the Undead Settlement

From the cleansing Chapel bonfire, head outside and turn right from where the four enemies are praying, Drop down and follow the path around until you reach an area with a large crystal enemy among some blue crystals. There will be an entrance to a grey stone area nearby where the ring is inside on a corpse
From the Profaned Capital bonfire, work your way to the area with the toxic swamp. The ring is on a corpse in the cave that you can drop into via the building above

In the Grand Archives, cross the bridge and proceed past the shortcut ladder by four Mage enemies and some bookshelves. The ring is on a corpse one level up next in an area with a bunch of books and cursed hands
In Lothric Caste in a room before the Sunlight Altar
Climb high onto the roof of the Grand Archives where three flying knights engage you. The ring is on a corpse at the top of the central tower in this area
You can pull a lever next to the bridge in the center of the Grand Archives to lower an adjacent bookshelf revealing a corpse with the ring
Sold by the Handmaid in Dark Firelink
In the locked cell with Siegward in Irithyll Dungeons. The key to the cell is in the right side chest at the end of a hallway leading away from the area with the giant
Behind an illusory wall above the main Firelink bonfire, requires key from Handmaid for 20k souls
Sold by Irina of Carim in Firelink
Dropped by an enemy in a tower accessible by a lift near the Cleansing Chapel bonfire
Reward for reaching rank 1 in the Blade of the Darkmoon covenant. The Silver Knights in Anor Londo can drop the covenant item (very rare), and you need 10 to reach rank 1
Given by Orbeck of Vinheim after returning a scroll and buying 3 sorceries

From the Irithyll Dungeon bonfire, proceed into the large room and follow the hallway to the right to a locked door. Open this door with the key from a cell upstairs on the other side of the large room and drop to a platform where this ring is on a corpse
Dropped by a large crab in the Crucifixion Woods
On an alter at the end of the hallway just before the Abandoned Tomb bonfire in the Catacombs of Carthus
Backtrack from the Halfway Keep bonfire in Crucifixion Woods to a bridge. You can drop to a ledge below and the ring is on a corpse nearby
Backtrack from the Pontiff Sulhvahn bonfire and fall off the ledge to a platform below
Obtained upon killing one of the giant crabs in Farron Keep
From the Crucifixion Woods bonfire, drop into the water and follow the wall until you see an opening. The ring is on a corpse in this area
On a corpse in a cell in the lowest level of Irithyll Dungeon
In a chest on the second level of the large room just beyond the kitchen area in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley somehwat close to the Distant Manor bonfire
Obtained by reaching rank 2 in Watchdogs of Farron covenant
Dropped by the giant atop the tower in the Undead Settlement
On a path to the right of Dark Firelink shrine
Obtained by killing the phantom invader Knight Slayer Tsorig near the bridge in the Catacombs of Carthus

Given by Anri of Astora either in the Catacombs of Carthus (if you tell of Horace's location) or at the Church of Yorshka bonfire. You must have first talked to Anri at the Halfway Fortress bonfire, then at Firelink, then in two places in the Catacombs of Carthus
Acquired by talking to Hawkwood after defeating the Abyss Watchers
Take the shortcut lift down to the toxic swamp before Oceiros' room but jump off early to access the path where the ring is on a corpse
Sold by Patches in Firelink
Sold by the Handmaid in Firelink (requires Easterner's Ashes from the area just past the Pontiff Sulyvahn bonfire)
On the highest roof in the area where you fight the Fire Demon with Siegward in the Undead Settlement
Behind an illusory wall near the Church of Yorshka bonfire (sort of under the Pontiff Sulyvahn fog door)
In an alcove to the left of the Ancient Wyvern area
In the Undead Settlement near the Cliff Underside bonfire. It's on a wooden structure dangling off a cliff
In a Mimic chest at the end of a sewer hallway that connects to the large lower level of Irithyll Dungeon
Backtrack from the Dragonslayer Armour boss room and go into the building on the left (with a lift). You can access a ledge via a hole in the wall where the ring is on a corpse
Given by Greirat in High Wall
On a corpse on the ledge that you run around to get past the giant in the Cathedral of the Deep
Sold by the Handmaid in Firelink after the Paladin's Ashes are returned
In an area with many breakable pots just before the Catacombs of Carthus bonfire
Head left from the Catacombs of Carthus bonfire, then take two rights and follow a path that leads to some wheel skeleton guys. The ring is on a corpse at the end of this path
Obtained by killing the Sulyvahn's Beast on the bridge upon entering Itithyll of the Boreal Valley
Trade with Ludleth of Courland for the Soul of Boreal Valley Vordt
Dropped by the Deep Accursed behind the main gate in Anor Londo
Dropped by the Deep Accursed in Cathedral of the Deep
Given by Sirris in Firelink after using her summon sign on the Boreal Valley bridge and defeating the enemy
Given by Orbeck of Vinheim after buying Aural Decoy, Farron Flashsword, Pestilent Mist, and Spook
Reward for reaching rank 1 in Rosaria's Fingers
Sold by Yuriel of Londor for 5000 souls
Sold by Yuriel of Londor for 5000 souls
In the Darkmoon Tomb right before entering Anor Londo
Appears on Ludleth's corpse in Firelink after killing the four lords of cinder, placing their remains on their thrones, and interacting with the bonfire
Use the Path of the Dragon gesture by the altar right next to the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum bonfire in Archdragon Peak
Found on an ledge/awning above a courtyard in High Wall of Lothric. Found in the watery area between the Church of Yorshka and Distant Manor Bonfires. Sold by Yuria in Firelink
On a ledge where you meet Siegward in the Undead Settlement that is accessed by jumping off the lift before it reaches the top

From the Dragon Barracks bonfire, cross the bridge and enter the room on the right. Climb a ladder and then exit through the door on the left. Once outside, head around to the right and look for the ring on a ledge below
From the Pontiff Sulyvahn bonfire, leave through the initial entrance and drop off a ledge straight ahead to land on a structure below. The ring in on ground level behind this structure
From the Great Belfry bonfire in Archdragon Peak, head outside and follow the path towards the altar. It's on the left side in a corner just through the second stone arch
In a walkway above the Pontiff Sulyvahn bonfire
At Dark Firelink Shrine behind the tower on the far right
Head to the right from the Farron Keep bonfire to an area with curse frogs. It's on a corpse in this area
Near the Profaned Capital bonfire, in an alcove on the roof of the front of building with the three big rhino/hand guys in the toxic water area
In an area with many breakable pots just before the Catacombs of Carthus bonfire
Backtrack from the Dragonslayer Armour bonfire and drop through a break in the railing on the right side of the area to access a room. The ring is on a ledge outside of this room
From where you start each playthrough, proceed straight ahead and then to the right to an area with a crystal enemy. The ring is in this area
Near the giant ballista above Smoldering Lake deep in the Catacombs of Carthus
Behind a well in the cemetery area of the Undead Settlement (where arrows rain down on you)
On a roof not far from the Tower on the Wall bonfire. Head out onto a large roof with one of the transforming monsters and go to the ladder where you will see the ring on the next roof over

From the Church of Yorshka bonfire in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley, proceed beyond the graveyard to the dark room with all the ghosts inside. Just outside the exit, take a right and drop down to a small rocky ledge below
Take the shortcut door to next to the Irithyll Dungeon bonfire to a lift. Jump off early to reach a platform where the ring is on a corpse
On a corpse in the water area of Crucifixion Woods near the giant crabs

Climb out onto the roof of the Grand Archives where three flying knights engage you. High atop this roof, you can drop into the inside of the building and then work your way down some rafters. The ring is on a corpse on one of the rafters
From the Keep Ruins bonfire, exit and circle the building
Behind the large structure right before the Deacons of the Deep boss room
From the Dancer of the Boreal Valley bonfire, climb the stairs and head left. Continue to the lift and go down. The ring is behind the lift at the bottom
Behind the large throne in Dark Firelink
On a ledge under a bridge that you cross as you progress from the Road of Sacrifices bonfire
On a wooden beam below the Prison Tower bonfire in Anor Londo

From the Cleansing Chapel bonfire, head through the door on the left and take a lift up to a tower. Go around the outside of the tower and climb a ladder to the top and then drop down to a slanted platform that leads up to a roof. Turn left and an axe wielding enemy will come out of an alcove. The ring is in this alcove
Visible on a platform in the catacombs off the left side of the first long bridge
From the Profaned Capital bonfire, climb down the interior ladder, exit through the hole in the wall, and turn right. The ring will be towards the end of this path
Located in the Smouldering Lake, near Demon Ruins bonfire. Behind a hidden wall where the Black Knight with axe is found. Right beside the Black Knight Sword

Backtrack from Dragonslayer Armour bonfire and go left into the building with a lift. Go through an opening on the left to get outside on a ledge. Drop down from that ledge onto a roof and the ring is on the right side
From the Keep Ruins bonfire, look behind the building beyond the three enemies on the bridge
In the area accessible after defeating the Nameless King
Visible on a ledge just below Flynn's Ring in the Siegward/Fire Demon area of the Undead Settlement
Climb high onto the roof of the Grand Archives where three flying knights engage you. The ring is in an alcove on the roof immediately above the area where the knights land

From the Dancer of the Boreal Valley bonfire, climb the ladder and head left. Once outside, follow the path to a lift and jump off halfway down. Head left and fall onto a platform, then jump to an adjacent platform where the ring is
On the left immediately outside the first boss door
In a corner behind some barrels in the room in High Wall of Lothric where Greirat's cell key and the first Estus Shard is found

In Irithyll of the Boreal Valley, after exiting the building with a Silver Knight shooting you with a greatbow, there are stairs to the left but instead turn right and look around the corner for the ring
Found on a corpse in the Corvian settlement church (Ashes of Ariandel DLC)
Acquired after defeating Livid Pyromancer Dunnel on a tower behind an illusory wall (Ashes of Ariandel DLC)
In the red pit near the Drop Bridge Cave bonfire (Ashes of Ariandel DLC)
Guarded by a mad tree near the Depths of the Painting bonfire (Ashes of Ariandel DLC)
After fighting the dragon after the Shared Grave bonfire, it's just inside the building next to the stairs with crystal lizard, behind 3 illusory walls (The Ringed City DLC)
A hidden area just shortly after you meet Lapp for the first time before Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire (The Ringed City DLC)
Acquired after defeating Desert Pyromancer Zoey (The Ringed City DLC)
Obtained by Soul of the Demon Prince Transposition (The Ringed City DLC)

After you see the first Cursed Angel, proceed forward through the arched doorway ahead. Looking towards the 2 knights at the end of the room take the arched doorway to the right. Turn right and head up to the back of the area and through another arched doorway. Proceed up the stairs and into through the doorway into a dead end room. Attack the wall on the left to reveal an illusionary wall. Proceed up the stairs until you come to the final room. The sorcery is at the back of the room next to the Murkman (The Ringed City DLC)
Obtained by Soul of Darkeater Midir Transposition (The Ringed City DLC)
Given by Sister Friede after talking to her twice (Ashes of Ariandel DLC)

From the Shared Grave Bonfire follow the path up past the bridge and into the Church. Take a left up the stairs. On the right theres should be an invisible wall/ path to an elevator. Take it up and on your right is a alcove you roll/walk into. Make a right from there and fall through the hole and pick up the ring (The Ringed City DLC)

Immediately after The Dreg Heap bonfire, head forward and past the horde of enemies to a corpse. When you try to grab it you will fall and the ceiling will break, and you will fall. Once at the bottom, out the only door, there will be an angel-like hollow firing projectiles at you. Drop down and run past it and take cover behind the building. Now circle around to the other side of the building along the planks (leaving yourself exposed to the Angel's beams) to find a corpse with the ring (The Ringed City DLC)
Dropped by Seeker of the Spurned (The Ringed City DLC)
Can be found on a corpse in The Dreg Heap, up a large root in the swamp just after the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire (The Ringed City DLC)

All the way down the stairs from the Shira and and left and up the ladder immediately on your left in the swamp. Double back across the bridge, defeating the two Ringed Knights. On a corpse in a room past them with Lapp inside (The Ringed City DLC)

After meeting the first angel that shoots at you fall down onto the perch and continue into the open door archway. From there you should see 2 Knight enemies and on the right hand side there is an area you enter. You make a right and you should be in some small quarter areas. Proceed all the way to the furthest wall north of you. Turn to the left and hit it to reveal a fog wall. Climb the stairs there and just before you obtain Great Soul Dreg on your left, is a balcony. From that balcony you must drop down and there is your ring (The Ringed City DLC)
Just below where you get invaded by Dark Spirit Ledo, on the ledges above the swamp (The Ringed City DLC)
Dropped from a mimic inside the spiral crypt across the bridge from the Ringed City Streets bonfire shortcut (The Ringed City DLC)
